name: Ghostrick Tengu
text:
1 non-Link "Ghostrick" monster
You can also Link Summon this card by sending 1 Set monster you control from the field to the GY. If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Ghostrick" monsters. If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Ghostrick" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, or you can Special Summon 1 "Ghostrick" monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Ghostrick Tengu" once per turn.
